There is a dex value that slows down the basic attacks of characters, at least an archmage, to the point where the time between 
basic attacks is incredibly large.

Just pointing out stuff.

Zardus - Is there any way you can display the formulas used to determine health and mana values for a character?  Or at least point 
me in the right direction of where to look?
